channel.title: pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Uncertainty-Aware Deep Learning
channel.description: Recent content in pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Uncertainty-Aware Deep Learning

item.title: News
item.description: [Jun 5, 2019] New preprint: Evaluating Scalable Bayesian Deep Learning Methods for Robust Computer Vision [arXiv] [code] [video] [project]. [May 18, 2019] I will present our extended abstract on ensembling as approximate Bayesian inference at SSDL 2019. [Apr 25, 2019] I have posted the first part in a short series of blog posts on how to get started with PyTorch and deep learning. [Nov 24, 2018] I was awarded the Tryggve Holm medal for “outstanding student achievements” during my time at Link√∂ping University.
